items.summary: OpenAI is collaborating with Deutsche Telekom to bring advanced, multilingual AI experiences to millions of people across Europe. ChatGPT Enterprise will also be deployed to help employees at Deutsche Telekom improve wo…

items.title: Building AI fluency at scale with ChatGPT Enterprise
items.summary: Commonwealth Bank of Australia partners with OpenAI to roll out ChatGPT Enterprise to 50,000 employees, building AI fluency at scale to improve customer service and fraud response.

items.title: Instacart and OpenAI partner on AI shopping experiences
items.summary: OpenAI and Instacart are deepening their longstanding partnership by bringing the first fully integrated grocery shopping and Instant Checkout payment app to ChatGPT.

items.title: The state of enterprise AI
items.summary: Key findings from OpenAI’s enterprise data show accelerating AI adoption, deeper integration, and measurable productivity gains across industries in 2025.

items.title: How Virgin Atlantic uses AI to enhance every step of travel
items.summary: Virgin Atlantic CFO Oliver Byers shares how the airline is using AI to speed up development, improve decision-making, and elevate customer experience.

items.title: Introducing OpenAI for Australia
items.summary: OpenAI is launching OpenAI for Australia to build sovereign AI infrastructure, upskill more than 1.5 million workers, and accelerate innovation across the country’s growing AI ecosystem.

items.title: How confessions can keep language models honest
items.summary: OpenAI researchers are testing “confessions,” a method that trains models to admit when they make mistakes or act undesirably, helping improve AI honesty, transparency, and trust in model outputs.

items.title: OpenAI to acquire Neptune
items.summary: OpenAI is acquiring Neptune to deepen visibility into model behavior and strengthen the tools researchers use to track experiments and monitor training.

items.title: Announcing the initial People-First AI Fund grantees
items.summary: The OpenAI Foundation announces the initial recipients of the People-First AI Fund, awarding $40.5M in unrestricted grants to 208 nonprofits supporting community innovation and opportunity.

items.title: Inside Mirakl's agentic commerce vision
items.summary: Mirakl is redefining commerce through AI agents and ChatGPT Enterprise—achieving faster documentation, smarter customer support, and building toward agent-native commerce with Mirakl Nexus.

items.title: Funding grants for new research into AI and mental health

items.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
items.summary: OpenAI and NORAD are bringing new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa” with three ChatGPT holiday tools that let families create festive elves, toy coloring pages, and custom Christmas stories.

items.title: Accenture and OpenAI accelerate enterprise AI success
items.summary: Accenture and OpenAI are collaborating to help enterprises bring agentic AI capabilities into the core of their business and unlock new levels of growth.

items.title: Mixpanel security incident: what OpenAI users need to know
items.summary: OpenAI shares details about a Mixpanel security incident involving limited API analytics data. No API content, credentials, or payment details were exposed. Learn what happened and how we’re protecting users.

items.title: Expanding data residency access to business customers worldwide
items.summary: OpenAI expands data residency for ChatGPT Enterprise, ChatGPT Edu, and the API Platform, enabling eligible customers to store data at rest in-region.

items.summary: We’re sharing our approach to mental health-related litigation. O handle sensitive cases with care, transparency, and respect while continuing to strengthen safety and support in ChatGPT.

items.summary: Shopping research in ChatGPT helps you explore, compare, and discover products with personalized buyer’s guides that simplify decision-making

items.summary: UCLA Professor Ernest Ryu and GPT-5 solved a key question in optimization theory, showcasing AI’s role in accelerating mathematical discovery.

items.summary: OpenAI introduces the first research cases showing how GPT-5 accelerates scientific progress across math, physics, biology, and computer science. Explore how AI and researchers collaborate to generate proofs, uncover ne…

items.title: Strengthening our safety ecosystem with external testing
items.summary: OpenAI works with independent experts to evaluate frontier AI systems. Third-party testing strengthens safety, validates safeguards, and increases transparency in how we assess model capabilities and risks.

items.title: How evals drive the next chapter in AI for businesses
items.summary: Learn how evals help businesses define, measure, and improve AI performance—reducing risk, boosting productivity, and driving strategic advantage.

items.title: How Scania is accelerating work with AI across its global workforce
items.summary: Description: Global manufacturer Scania is scaling AI with ChatGPT Enterprise. With team-based onboarding and strong guardrails, AI is boosting productivity, quality, and innovation.

items.title: Building more with GPT-5.1-Codex-Max
items.summary: Introducing GPT-5.1-Codex-Max, a faster, more intelligent agentic coding model for Codex. The model is designed for long-running, project-scale work with enhanced reasoning and token efficiency.

items.title: A free version of ChatGPT built for teachers
items.summary: ChatGPT for Teachers is a secure workspace with education‑grade privacy and admin controls. Free for verified U.S. K–12 educators through June 2027.
